DOC.brief_title: An Investigational Drug Study Assess Weight Loss Obese Overweight Patients ( 0364-037 ) ( TERMINATED )
DOC.criteria: Male female , 18 year age old , Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 30 kg/m2 43 kg/m2 , inclusive ( BMI 27 kg/m2 43 kg/m2 , inclusive , obesityrelated comorbidities ) . Obesityrelated comorbidities associate BMI 27 kg/m2 high include hypertension , dyslipidemia sleep apnea Stable weight ( +/3 kg ) least 3 month prior study start History diabetes mellitis , major psychiatric disorder , significant cardiovascular disease , stroke , TIA , neurological disorder , nonfebrile seizure Screening systolic blood pressure > 160 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure > 100 mm Hg
